Subject: EPP issue for in-house sites. Its blocking sites.
Description:
This is to bring to your notice, randomly this EPP software does not allow sites which are valid. It keeps alerting it. Please look into it and get back. 
As a part of research cell, we keep checking random sites or AI applications that too at times are blocked by this EPP.
Please note that this happens randomly, not every time.  After waiting for some time, re-opening it again, the pops go off.
What_We_Know__c:
Customer encounter an issue with the EPP which is blocking URLs.

This is happening randomly that EPP software does not allow sites which are valid. It keeps alerting it. 
As a part of research cell, they have checked random sites or AI applications that are blocked by this EPP.
Next_Steps__c:
We requested additional details about what EPP version are they using and if the use DPI module.

We have scheduled a remote session to check the issue.

The customer have the EPP server version 5.7.0.0 and we recommend them to upgrade to the latest version.

We have performed a follow up on the case.
